A study conducted by the National Business Aviation Association (NBAA <[[https://nbaa.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/nexa-business-aviation-and-top-performing-companies-2017.pdf]]>) found that “Business aviation contributes meaningfully to a company’s enterprise value, and continues to be a powerful tool of the best-managed companies in America.”
As you already know, operating a business aircraft improves your team's productivity, accelerates transactional closings, and boosts customer interactions resulting in improved retention and more. But, the silent hero keeping information flowing and productivity high is the Wi-Fi connectivity system. With Honeywell JetWaveTM, you and your passengers can tap into Inmarsat’s Jet ConneX service and experience fast and consistent Wi-Fi from taxi to touchdown.
Within the next 15 years, 98% of aircraft will have connectivity solutions <[[https://nbaa.org/aircraft-operations/communications-navigation-surveillance-cns/connectivity/]]>. Boost your competitive edge with JetWave!
Contact Pentastar Aviation today to get started.
